name: Pickthall
text: Alif. Lam. Ra. These are verses of the Scripture and a plain Reading.

name: Pickthall
text: It may be that those who disbelieve wish ardently that they were Muslims.

name: Pickthall
text: Let them eat and enjoy life, and let (false) hope beguile them. They will come to know!

name: Pickthall
text: And We destroyed no township but there was a known decree for it.

name: Pickthall
text: No nation can outstrip its term nor can they lag behind.

name: Pickthall
text: And they say: O thou unto whom the Reminder is revealed, lo! thou art indeed a madman!

name: Pickthall
text: Why bringest thou not angels unto us, if thou art of the truthful?

name: Pickthall
text: We send not down the angels save with the Fact, and in that case (the disbelievers) would not be tolerated.

name: Pickthall
text: Lo! We, even We, reveal the Reminder, and lo! We verily are its Guardian.

name: Pickthall
text: We verily sent (messengers) before thee among the factions of the men of old.

name: Pickthall
text: And never came there unto them a messenger but they did mock him.

name: Pickthall
text: Thus do We make it traverse the hearts of the guilty:

name: Pickthall
text: They believe not therein, though the example of the men of old hath gone before.

name: Pickthall
text: And even if We opened unto them a gate of heaven and they kept mounting through it,

name: Pickthall
text: They would say: Our sight is wrong - nay, but we are folk bewitched.

name: Pickthall
text: And verily in the heaven we have set mansions of the stars, and We have beautified it for beholders.

name: Pickthall
text: And We have guarded it from every outcast devil,

name: Pickthall
text: Save him who stealeth the hearing, and them doth a clear flame pursue.

name: Pickthall
text: And the earth have We spread out, and placed therein firm hills, and caused each seemly thing to grow therein.

name: Pickthall
text: And we have given unto you livelihoods therein, and unto those for whom ye provide not.

name: Pickthall
text: And there is not a thing but with Us are the stores thereof. And we send it not down save in appointed measure.

name: Pickthall
text: And We send the winds fertilising, and cause water to descend from the sky, and give it you to drink. It is not ye who are the holders of the store thereof.

name: Pickthall
text: Lo! and it is We, even We, Who quicken and give death, and We are the Inheritor.

name: Pickthall
text: And verily We know the eager among you and verily We know the laggards.

name: Pickthall
text: Lo! thy Lord will gather them together. Lo! He is Wise, Aware.

name: Pickthall
text: Verily We created man of potter's clay of black mud altered,

name: Pickthall
text: And the jinn did We create aforetime of essential fire.

name: Pickthall
text: And (remember) when thy Lord said unto the angels: Lo! I am creating a mortal out of potter's clay of black mud altered,

name: Pickthall
text: So, when I have made him and have breathed into him of My Spirit, do ye fall down, prostrating yourselves unto him.

name: Pickthall
text: So the angels fell prostrate, all of them together

name: Pickthall
text: Save Iblis. He refused to be among the prostrate.

name: Pickthall
text: He said: O Iblis! What aileth thee that thou art not among the prostrate?

name: Pickthall
text: He said: I am not one to prostrate myself unto a mortal whom Thou hast created out of potter's clay of black mud altered!

name: Pickthall
text: He said: Then go thou forth from hence, for lo! thou art outcast.

name: Pickthall
text: And lo! the curse shall be upon thee till the Day of Judgment.

name: Pickthall
text: He said: My Lord! Reprieve me till the day when they are raised.

name: Pickthall
text: He said: Then lo! thou art of those reprieved

name: Pickthall
text: Till the Day of appointed time.

name: Pickthall
text: He said: My Lord! Because Thou hast sent me astray, I verily shall adorn the path of error for them in the earth, and shall mislead them every one,

name: Pickthall
text: Save such of them as are Thy perfectly devoted slaves.

name: Pickthall
text: He said: This is a right course incumbent upon Me:

name: Pickthall
text: Lo! as for My slaves, thou hast no power over any of them save such of the froward as follow thee,

name: Pickthall
text: And lo! for all such, hell will be the promised place.

name: Pickthall
text: It hath seven gates, and each gate hath an appointed portion.

name: Pickthall
text: Lo! those who ward off (evil) are among gardens and watersprings.

name: Pickthall
text: (And it is said unto them): Enter them in peace, secure.

name: Pickthall
text: And We remove whatever rancour may be in their breasts. As brethren, face to face, (they rest) on couches raised.

name: Pickthall
text: Toil cometh not unto them there, nor will they be expelled from thence.

name: Pickthall
text: Announce, (O Muhammad) unto My slaves that verily I am the Forgiving, the Merciful,

name: Pickthall
text: And that My doom is the dolorous doom.

name: Pickthall
text: And tell them of Abraham's guests,

name: Pickthall
text: (How) when they came in unto him, and said: Peace. He said: Lo! we are afraid of you.

name: Pickthall
text: They said: Be not afraid! Lo! we bring thee good tidings of a boy possessing wisdom.

name: Pickthall
text: He said: Bring ye me good tidings (of a son) when old age hath overtaken me? Of what then can ye bring good tidings?

name: Pickthall
text: They said: We bring thee good tidings in truth. So be not thou of the despairing.

name: Pickthall
text: He said: And who despaireth of the mercy of his Lord save those who are astray?

name: Pickthall
text: He said: And afterward what is your business, O ye messengers (of Allah)?

name: Pickthall
text: They said: We have been sent unto a guilty folk,

name: Pickthall
text: (All) save the family of Lot. Them we shall deliver every one,

name: Pickthall
text: Except his wife, of whom We had decreed that she should be of those who stay behind.

name: Pickthall
text: And when the messengers came unto the family of Lot,

name: Pickthall
text: He said: Lo! ye are folk unknown (to me).

name: Pickthall
text: They said: Nay, but we bring thee that concerning which they keep disputing,

name: Pickthall
text: And bring thee the Truth, and lo! we are truth-tellers.

name: Pickthall
text: So travel with thy household in a portion of the night, and follow thou their backs. Let none of you turn round, but go whither ye are commanded.

name: Pickthall
text: And We made plain the case to him, that the root of them (who did wrong) was to be cut at early morn.

name: Pickthall
text: And the people of the city came, rejoicing at the news (of new arrivals).

name: Pickthall
text: He said: Lo! they are my guests. Affront me not!

name: Pickthall
text: And keep your duty to Allah, and shame me not!

name: Pickthall
text: They said; Have we not forbidden you from (entertaining) anyone?

name: Pickthall
text: He said: Here are my daughters, if ye must be doing (so).

name: Pickthall
text: By thy life (O Muhammad) they moved blindly in the frenzy of approaching death.

name: Pickthall
text: Then the (Awful) Cry overtook them at the sunrise.

name: Pickthall
text: And We utterly confounded them, and We rained upon them stones of heated clay.

name: Pickthall
text: Lo! therein verily are portents for those who read the signs.

name: Pickthall
text: And lo! it is upon a road still uneffaced.

name: Pickthall
text: Lo! therein is indeed a portent for believers.

name: Pickthall
text: And the dwellers in the wood indeed were evil-doers.

name: Pickthall
text: So we took vengeance on them; and lo! they both are on a high-road plain to see.

name: Pickthall
text: And the dwellers in Al-Hijr denied (Our) messengers.

name: Pickthall
text: And we gave them Our revelations, but they were averse to them.

name: Pickthall
text: And they used to hew out dwellings from the hills, (wherein they dwelt) secure.

name: Pickthall
text: But the (Awful) Cry overtook them at the morning hour,

name: Pickthall
text: And that which they were wont to count as gain availed them not.

name: Pickthall
text: We created not the heavens and the earth and all that is between them save with truth, and lo! the Hour is surely coming. So forgive, (O Muhammad), with a gracious forgiveness.

name: Pickthall
text: Lo! Thy Lord! He is the All-Wise Creator.

name: Pickthall
text: We have given thee seven of the oft-repeated (verses) and the great Qur'an.

name: Pickthall
text: Strain not thine eyes toward that which We cause some wedded pairs among them to enjoin, and be not grieved on their account, and lower thy wing (in tenderness) for the believers.

name: Pickthall
text: And say: Lo! I, even I, am a plain warner,

name: Pickthall
text: Such as We send down for those who make division,

name: Pickthall
text: Those who break the Qur'an into parts.

name: Pickthall
text: Them, by thy Lord, We shall question, every one,

name: Pickthall
text: Of what they used to do.

name: Pickthall
text: So proclaim that which thou art commanded, and withdraw from the idolaters.

name: Pickthall
text: Lo! We defend thee from the scoffers,

name: Pickthall
text: Who set some other god along with Allah. But they will come to know.

name: Pickthall
text: Well know We that thy bosom is oppressed by what they say,

name: Pickthall
text: But hymn the praise of thy Lord, and be of those who make prostration (unto Him).

name: Pickthall
text: And serve thy Lord till the Inevitable cometh unto thee.
